site.description: To install Erlide, please point your Eclipse Update Manager at this site. We support Eclipse 3.3 and later.

category-def.name: stable
category-def.label: Stable builds (Eclipse 3.4+)
category-def.description: These builds have been around a little longer and are reasonably stable.

category-def.name: unstable
category-def.label: Unstable builds
category-def.description: These builds may be broken, so use at your own risk.

category-def.name: stable_eclipse33
category-def.label: Stable builds (Eclipse 3.3+)
category-def.description: These are the Eclipse 3.3 releases. Not maintained after 0.5.0!
